name: The Adventure of Builder Boy
description:
Builder Boy first job is about to be cancelled if he doesn't come to work today.

But the city is under alien attack!

Help Builder Boy get to his workplace to make him rich.

Game Control:

Press A - D to move Left and Right

Press W - S to Climb up the ladder

Press Z to Hammer Time!

Press Space to Jump

Credit:
Programming & Art By Me!

Audio and Music: 

8-Bit Action Pack By Maskedsound
8-bit & 16-bit sound effects By ivy
